::Havotron/Darkwing::
Havotron nods back to Spinister then as Spinister's eyes leave him to 
Darkwing he follows them.  

Darkwing steps back at the glance.

Havotron looks at him then back to Spinister and smiles.
'Yes he will be my second man.'

"Follow me," he sais leading the two to a back room.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Spinister keeps eye contact with Havotron, and nods. He dosent say
> anything. He then turns his head towards Darkwing, and gives him a
> piercing look, the kind a reaper would give you, when you die.
> 
> Slugslinger walks out of the building, leaps to the air, and 
transforms,
> flying off into the horizen. Apeface does the same.
